website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, wheeled design for hopper simplifies carrying hundreds of balls. Excellent welded construction.
pros: Includes locking lid to keep balls from popping out of the basket during transport
Can hold up to 325 balls in main basket
Smaller storage area near bottom of cart for other equipment
Main basket is a convenient height for pulling out tennis balls
cons: High price point versus other tennis ball hoppers
No mechanism built into hopper for picking up stray balls

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after getting tired of dragging buckets of balls to the courts. It is super well made, sturdy and moves well. It holds a lot of balls. Makes court cleanup easy and is a great height to help the coach/parent hurl the balls without having to bend over. Saves the back! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mum2many

customer_reviews.title: Buy used if they have one.
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious about you need this. As others have mentioned, buying it "used" was the best way to go. It arrived in like new condition. I guess it was a return item that had never been assembled. It only took me about 10 minutes to put it together with my son using an electric drill. We use it every day. It is very well built.
customer_reviews.author: srfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Best basket extremely affordable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, locking wheels and basket. Easy to assemble looks great and will last years. Price is extremely reasonable. Highly recommend bought 3!
customer_reviews.author: craig pautler

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. We expect them to last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for classes at our clubhouse tennis courts. Very sturdy. We expect them to last a long time. We received them very quickly and they were simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Best teaching cart
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I have bought 3 of these with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "used" version, thinking the used ones were probably purchased new by people who couldn't get the thing in their vehicles, then returned it in new condition. So, it came boxed with open plastic package inside. Otherwise, it was new. It's probably too heavy for small people to handle in and out of vehicle. Saved about $30.00 It is built like a tank!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Good quality. Sturdy, holds a lot of tennis balls so your not constantly bending to pick up balls and will work out very well on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ball hopper has been awesome. I would purchase this again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The materials are very durable and I believe it will last us for decades to come. The wheels are big and dependable that you won't have a hard time moving the cart around even on grass.
customer_reviews.author: NateDog

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The communication is great, and the shipment is smooth. It is simple and easy to assemble. The size is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eiji Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: great except a little tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The ball cart is fantastic and makes life easier around the tennis court practice sessions, it was just a little tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.author: movieidol

customer_reviews.title: A great cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cart with big, strong wheels. I have enjoyed using it a t practice with my tennis team.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Thacker

product_meta.title: Gamma Sports Premium Tennis Teaching and Travel Carts - Unique Sports Equipment, Large Ball Capacity, Heavy Duty Designs, Ideal Training Court Accessories
product_meta.description: The Gamma Brute™ Teaching Cart™ offers a 325-ball capacity and was designed to fit through the gates and doorways typically found at tennis courts. The durable construction consists of a heavy duty coated wire basket, chrome plated legs, padded handle, and bolted wheels with ball bearing swivel (including 2 with locking brake).
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION! – This amazing tennis ball training cart is the perfect court accessory! Its heavy duty and sturdy, reinforced welded construction makes it extremely durable and reliable.

THE IDEAL OUTDOOR TRAINING PARTNER! – Due to its diamond clad weather-resistant powder coating and its easy locking lid, this premium Gamma sports tennis travel cart is a must-have for tennis training!

SAFE AND SECURE DESIGN! – This handy tennis ball travel basket features a unique locking lid that easily secures up to 325 tennis balls! Plus, its soft, padded handle makes it easy and comfortable to use!

YOU CAN TAKE IT ANYWHERE! – Since our tennis travel cart has secure bolted caster wheels with ball bearing swivel, you can easily move it anywhere on the court! Plus, it has a convenient under-basket tray for extra equipment!

SERVING FOR SUCCESS! – We aim to provide the best tennis court equipment for professional and amateur players and coaches and consequently back our elite tennis accessories with a full money back guarantee!
